reviews.review: A solid sequel. The music plays out like a musical. I believe they won’t get any radio play because the songs aren’t pop driven. It gives the film a level of charm. Animation is crip and warm. A beauty to behold. The characters are more lovable then ever especially Olaf who didn’t come off as annoying as he did previously. In fact, he had many witty lines he delivered. The pacing was good. What I thought was lacking was an actual (‘present’) villain as well as sense of daring ‘into the unknown.’ Its as if this film was supposed to help understand our attitude towards change but ended up talking about their past more. The first installment was exciting because you have a heroine that was relatable and a sister that was relatable too. It was a constant struggle between who they should be and what they want to be. This installment shares the same sentiment but its not relatable because you realize that this was all predestined. Enough complaining on my part. A solid sequel. I liked it a lot.
Remember:  its a kids movie.  Its a great movie...and my kids (target demo) loved it.
I love this movie i mean great
Great and fun for the whole family
We waited a long time for this movie and it did not disappoint! loved it very much and so did my 7 year old daughter and 6 year old son.

I was so looking forward to this follow-up. Like a majority of sequels, Frozen II fell short. While the overall general plot was intriguing, the songs truly lacked the punch of the first film. In fact, all the songs are completely forgettable, with the exception of the North Wind Lullaby. Such a disappointment.

This movie was not only the perfect sequel to Frozen but may very well be the most perfect movie Disney has ever made. Would not be surprised to see this movie grab some Oscar noms, as in best picture.
Uhhhhhmazing!!!! Even better than the original!! The characters, the music, an entire transformation!! It’s a must see!

Great family story, the characters are less lifelike vs Frozen 1. My youngest commented that character smiles are looking ‘creepy’, they should have left the CG models as-is. More music numbers and catchy as ever, will be listening to kids belt them out for another month or so - just like Frozen 1. Good family movie !!
Great movie! Message may be a little too deep for younger viewers but entertaining nonetheless.
